weave.servlets

Interface IWeaveEntityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataService

    public interface IWeaveEntityService
    Interface for a service which provides RPC functions for retrieving Weave Entity information.
    Author:
    adufilie

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] findEntityIds(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata, java.lang.String[] wildcardFields)
      Gets an Array of entity IDs with matching public metadata.

      Finds matching values for a public metadata field.

      Gets an Array of Entity objects, minus the private metadata.

      Gets EntityHierarchyInfo objects containing basic information on entities matching public metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • getHierarchyInfo

        DataConfig.EntityHierarchyInfo[] getHierarchyInfo(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata)
                                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets EntityHierarchyInfo objects containing basic information on entities matching public metadata.
        Parameters:
        publicMetadata - EntityMetadata containing values to match.
        Returns:
        An Array of EntityHierarchyInfo objects, sorted by title.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getEntities

        DataConfig.DataEntityWithRelationships[] getEntities(int[] ids)
                                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets an Array of Entity objects, minus the private metadata.
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of entity IDs.
        Returns:
        An Array of Entity objects.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • findEntityIds

        int[] findEntityIds(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata,
                  java.lang.String[] wildcardFields)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets an Array of entity IDs with matching public metadata.
        Parameters:
        publicMetadata - Public metadata to search for.
        wildcardFields - A list of field names in publicMetadata that should be treated as search strings with wildcards '?' and '*' for single-character and multi-character matching, respectively.
        Returns:
        An Array of IDs matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • findPublicFieldValues

        java.lang.String[] findPublicFieldValues(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                       java.lang.String valueSearch)
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Finds matching values for a public metadata field.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the public metadata field to search.
        valueSearch - A search string.
        Returns:
        An Array of matching values for the specified public metadata field.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
